tool_description: UK - search for all restaurants, pubs, bars, cafes, coffee shops and nightclubs in the UK. Find establishment names, addresses, postcodes, food hygiene ratings, local authorities, latitudes, longitudes and plenty more.
title: Wyre Data

api_list.name: Get ratings by restaurant
api_list.description: Find a Food Hygiene Rating for a restaurant
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://wyre-data.p.rapidapi.com/restaurants/ratings/{restaurant}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wyre-data.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
